answers.answer: I have not been diagnosed with preeclampsia, but my blood pressure has slowly been increasing and is now borderline. I'll be induced at 37 weeks, so there's a good chance you may be. Depending on your results and all.

Depending on how high your bp and protein levels are they are probably going to induce you, if they feel you will be okay a few more days they may wait til you hit 37 weeks. With my first I was monitored close for preeclampsia and kept my hospital bag in the car just in case. They may also have you go do a nst to see how baby is doing if they decide to let you go to 37 weeks.

Well I'll find out what's going to happen Monday at my weekly appointment. They scheduled an ultrasound as well to check her out.I have preclampsia 1100 protein count on a 24 hour urine when it should be under 300 so fun funThank you and anymore ideas of what could happen would still be good to hear

question: I'm 36w + 3d and I had to do a 24 hour urine due to protein in my pee and increased blood pressure. Well I got a call late last night telling me that I needed to come in today because my tests came back abnormal (meaning I probably have preclampsia). What happens when you're diagnosed with it this late? My husband is scared they are going try and induce me when I go in today after reading up preclampsia.So does anyone have any experience with this? What happens?
title: emergency appointment? preclampsia
